lyrics:
12 contributorspeople lyricsintro
thank you
for listening again
or for the first time
or for the last time
we share this moment
and i am grateful for this

verse 1
i was born to rage
for my fathers pain
with my brothers style
for my mothers reign
we could use some hope
we must learn to cope

prechorus
so be good with goodbyes
so be good with goodbyes
alright now

chorus
people people
have you heard the good news
theres people people
theyre running just like you
today i say
its all that matters for now
for you
and i
wooo
so people people
make some good ol love
you might also likeverse 2
well i lost my pride
with this body of mine
in another land
i began to understand
i got love for all your hate
i got lost to find my way

prechorus
so be good with goodbyes
so be good with goodbyes
yeah
alright now

chorus
people people
have you heard the good news
theres people people
theyre running just like you
today i say
its all that matters for now
for you
and i
wooo
so people people
make some good ol love
verse 3
my knife is a dream
its a beautiful world
shell never leave
its a beautiful world
her body sits tight
when shes hitchin a ride
hey man im sorry
im not lookin to fight

bridge
we were born to rage
were the price of pain
were a single voice
were the second choice
we were born to rage

chorus
people people
have you heard the good news
theres people people
theyre running just like you
today i say
its all that matters for now
for you
and i
wooo
